content: "Experience the epitome of urban living in this spectacular side-by-side duplex loft condo. This one-of-a-kind property boasts 2 spacious bedrooms and 2 luxurious bathrooms, offering ample space for comfortable living. The open-concept layout is accentuated by high ceilings and an abundance of natural light filtering through the skylights in the master bedroom bathroom. The sleek and modern design is highlighted by exposed brick walls, hardwood floors, and a cozy fireplace. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and an island, perfect for entertaining. The bedrooms are both generously sized and feature ample closet space and natural light. The master bedroom features a spa-like en-suite bathroom with a double vanity and walk-in shower, as well as skylights that fill the space with natural light. The second bedroom shares the second full bathroom with guests. Enjoy the private outdoor space, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. This unique property is a must-see for anyone looking for the ultimate in urban luxury."
